name: Portfolio with React
description: Personal protfolio created with JavaScript's library React. Ever seen the movie Inception?

name: FizzBuzz Challenge
description: Have you ever played FizzBuzz? This app I developed will play with you!

name: ATM System
description: Using Ruby I developed a fully functioning ATM System. Create a person and an account and interact with the sustem!

name: Library App
description: Another fully functioning app for a library. Adding books, leasing books, due dates and searches. It's all in there!

name: Address Book
description: This app developed with JavaScript allows you add contacts so you'll have everyone's number, email, name and much more at hand.

name: ToDo List
description: Because everyone has a lot to do everyday, this app I develop with React will help you keep track of your daily progress.

name: Daily Joke
description: In this app you can see what day it is today, aaand you get a different joke everytime as a bonus.

name: BMI Calculator
description: When was your last cheat day? Follow your dietary success (or insuccess) with this BMI calculator I developed with JavaScript.

name: My First Website
description: When I started my coding bootcamp at Craft Academy, this was the first code I wrote! Fun times!
